name: MEC In-Flight Hoodie - Men's
description:
Over your favourite tee, or layered under a shell, this hoodie will keep you comfy and warm. The In-Flight Hoodie is made from a soft fleece that will make waiting at the gate a bit easier and chilling at the cabin that much better. The In-Flight line offers the type of comfort that can make travel days bearable and has a hint of streetwear style.Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort.Soft, fleecy polyester blend is light and packs well.Dual zippered pockets give you a safe place to stash your daily necessitates.Raglan sleeves offer a comfortable mobility any keep seams out from under pack straps.3-piece hood stays close to your head, holding in the warmth.Integrated hanger loop for quick drying and less wrinkles.Center back length is 26.75” (size M – 1” difference between sizes).

Regular fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
